name: devflow
description: PM-like hearing and automated dev workflow with 6 specialized agents. Supports TypeScript/Python/Go/Rust.

agents.name: orchestrator
agents.description: PM-like hearing and automated development workflow orchestration

agents.name: planner
agents.description: Design creation and impact analysis from requirements

agents.name: tester
agents.description: Auto-detect test frameworks and generate/execute test code

agents.name: reviewer
agents.description: Code quality and security review with output reports

agents.name: documenter
agents.description: Auto-generate README, API specs, and architecture docs
